document_data.name: ''Divine Fury''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Divine Fury''''' was the name given to a number of magical [[katana]]s that appeared in [[northwest Faerûn]] ''circa'' [[1372 DR]].
document_data.History: Although unconfirmed, in the account of [[Kaa Mihnd]], these swords were forged from fallen stars that crashed into the square of a poor fishing village somewhere. Kaa Mihnd and the other villagers used these swords to rise up against their rich overlord and reclaim their ancestral land.
document_data.Description: These katanas bore either a wide guard or a brown cloth wrapped around the lower blade.
document_data.Powers: A ''Divine Fury'' was a ''+3 katana'' that inflicted electrical burns and could stun an opponent for a dozen seconds.
